entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming north 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A mix of sun and cloud. Low minus 12.
